product_type: Food (Various dishes: rice, pizza, crepes, desserts)
target_audience: 18-45, both genders, foodies, students, people interested in deals and delivery
color_scheme: Red, yellow, white, blue; warm and inviting
cta_type: Order Now (implied through phone number and delivery mentions)
marketing_objective: Conversion (driving orders and sales), Awareness (brand recognition)
special_elements: Prices (implied), offers (discounts, free delivery), 24/7 availability, location (Abu Dhabi - Khalidiya)
